```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(nycflights13)
```

```{r}
flights %>%
  filter(dest == "IAH") %>%
  group_by(year, month, day) %>%
  summarize(
    n = n(),
    delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  filter(n > 10)

flights %>%
  filter(
    carrier == "UA",
    dest %in% c("IAH", "HOU"),
    sched_dep_time > 900,
    sched_arr_time < 2000
  ) %>%
  group_by(flight) %>%
  summarize(
    delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE),
    cancelled = sum(is.na(arr_delay)),
    n = n()
  ) %>%
  filter(n > 10)

```

```{r 5.2 }

billboard

billboard |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("wk"), 
    names_to = "week", 
    values_to = "rank"
  )

billboard |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("wk"), 
    names_to = "week", 
    values_to = "rank",
    values_drop_na = TRUE
  )

billboard_longer <- billboard |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("wk"), 
    names_to = "week", 
    values_to = "rank",
    values_drop_na = TRUE
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    week = parse_number(week)
  )
billboard_longer

billboard_longer |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = week, y = rank, group = track)) + 
  geom_line(alpha = 0.25) + 
  scale_y_reverse()
```
